translations: n．树枝（复数）：树木的主要分支。
· The boughs of the tree were heavy with fruit.

sentences.sentence: Away rattled the nuts down among the boughs and one of the thieves cried, "Bless me, it is hailing."
sentences.translation: 坚果从树枝间哗啦哗啦地掉了下来，一个小偷叫道：“天哪，下冰雹了。”

sentences.sentence: They piled on great dead boughs till they had a roaring furnace, and were gladhearted once more.
sentences.translation: 他们把很多枯枝堆在一起，直到火焰熊熊燃烧，他们又高兴起来了。

sentences.sentence: The green boughs glittered with all their pearls of dew.
sentences.translation: 绿枝上闪烁着露珠的光彩。
